alert.note: Alert for Champaign; De Witt; McLean; Piatt; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 7:06PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Woodford, northern Piatt, eastern De Witt, western Vermilion, McLean and northern Champaign Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 703 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Bloomington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39 between mile markers 0 and 21. Interstate 55 between mile markers 161 and 187. Interstate 57 between mile markers 238 and 257. Interstate 74 between mile markers 126 and 130, and between mile markers 136 and 179. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; De Witt; McLean; Piatt; Woodford
